derivation.yuyuan_name: Latin (also denoting the periwinkle), from Greek klēmatis, from klēma 'vine branch'

entry.def: A clematis is a type of flowering shrub which can be grown to climb up walls or fences. There are many different varieties of clematis.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various ornamental climbing plants of the genus Clematis usually having showy flowers
